author: Staff Reporter
text:
Enraged over alleged irregularities in identification of beneficiaries under National Food Security Act (NFSA), workers of Puri district Congress hurled eggs at vehicle of Food Supplies and Consumer Welfare Minister Sanjay Das Burma on Sunday.

Mr. Burma was camping at Special Circuit House, government guest accommodation, at Puri when the unsavoury incident took place.

Waving the party flag, angry Congress workers marched towards Circuit House where Mr. Burma was staying.

They were stopped by guards, but workers who came prepared to register their protest started throwing eggs at his official vehicle.

Puri Superintendent of Police Ashish Singh rushed to the spot to prevent the incident going out of control.

A Congress member on condition of anonymity said, “Biju Janata Dal government is neck-deep in corruption. BJD workers including many high-ranked people’s representatives have secured ration cards under NFSA misusing their official positions. They have taken away rights of poor.”

“Congress workers had come prepared to make their dissatisfaction know to the Minister,” he said. It needs to be mentioned that Mayor of Cuttack Municipal Corporation Anita Behera had to resign from her post and as corporator after her name was detected in beneficiary list. Subsequently, on verification names of seven more corporators were found in the NFSA list.
title: Congress workers hurl eggs at Odisha Minister
